message: Let's be reasonable, I'm giving you a good deal!
I think we can find something more equitable. This offer accounts for future rounds.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
Time is running out, and the value is decreasing. This is my final offer.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm still not convinced. This is a better deal for you than my last one.
This is it. A 50/50 split is the only fair solution. Take it or leave it.
